titles.title: To establish a commission to study the establishment of a national education museum and archive for the United States.
To establish a commission to study the establishment of a national education museum and archive for the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of Education to appoint a national commission, including representatives from both the public and private sectors, to study the development, creation, and operation of a national education museum and archive.
